reviewText: The forerunner of this fine Australian film is the  American film "Old Yella", which I saw as a very young child, which to me was more confronting than "Red Dog"(because it struck closer to home), but nonetheless a great film for parents to curl up with there children, and view. If you want to know more abour Australia or "Australiana", well, tune in. No spoilers,but I'm sure you will be moved by this little gem!
